items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.

I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. items.content_html: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.
